title: Resident Lounge, Automatic Payment Options Available, Secured Access
posting_body: ['Glendale Park is a 13-story seniors only building catering to those 55-years of age and over and who have low to very low income.', ' Glendale offers two different one-bedroom floor plans and offers monthly activities, great views of Memphis, relaxing balconies and professional management.', '  Come take a tour today and see for yourself why our seniors love us!', '-Maintenance On-Site', '-Planned Monthly Activities', '-Walk-In Closets', '-Secured Access', '-Common Areas Monitored by 24-Hour Video Surveillance', '-High Speed Internet Access', '-Resident Lounge', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Professional Management Team', '-Disability Access', '-Elevator/s', '-Automatic Payment Options Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
